title: Course 1: Introduction to Python
heading: Python Fundamentals
details: Learn the basics of Python programming, including syntax, data types, and control structures.

title: Course 2: Web Development with HTML/CSS
heading: Web Development Essentials
details: Master front-end web development using HTML and CSS. Create responsive web pages and layouts.

title: Course 3: Java Programming
heading: Advanced Java
details: In-depth Java programming course for software developers. Cover object-oriented concepts and more.

title: Course 4: Data Science with Python
heading: Data Analysis and ML
details: Explore data analysis and machine learning using Python. Hands-on projects included.

title: Course 5: Mobile App Development with Flutter
heading: Flutter and Dart
details: Build cross-platform mobile apps with Flutter and Dart. Real-world app development experience.

title: Course 6: C# Game Development
heading: Game Development
details: Create 2D and 3D games using C# and Unity. Game design principles and mechanics covered.

title: Course 7: Full-Stack Web Development
heading: Full-Stack Skills
details: Learn front-end and back-end web development technologies. Build dynamic web applications.

title: Course 8: Advanced JavaScript
heading: Advanced JS Concepts
details: Take your JavaScript skills to the next level with advanced concepts and best practices.

title: Course 9: DevOps and Continuous Integration
heading: DevOps Practices
details: Master DevOps practices and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
